GAMEPLAY_SyringeFullDescription.English: A hypodermic syringe with a single dose of Morphine Sulfate. For emergency use only. Avoid alcohol.
GAMEPLAY_SyringeFullDescription.Japanese: 1回分のモルヒネが入った皮下注射器。使用は緊急時に限定し、飲酒は避けること。

GAMEPLAY_TorphineVialDescription.English: A vial of Morphine Sulfate for IV use. Can fill three syringes. (5mg/ml - 10ml)
GAMEPLAY_TorphineVialDescription.Japanese: 静脈注射用モルヒネのバイアル瓶。注射器を3本まで満たすことができる（5mg/ml - 10ml）。
